BugInstance.message: Found reliance on default encoding in new br.unb.cic.iris.MainProgram(): new java.util.Scanner(InputStream)
There is an apparent infinite recursive loop in br.unb.cic.iris.MainProgram.readCommand()
Found reliance on default encoding in br.unb.cic.iris.command.console.ConsoleConnectCommand.execute(): new java.util.Scanner(InputStream)
br.unb.cic.iris.command.console.ConsoleQuitCommand.execute() invokes System.exit(...), which shuts down the entire virtual machine
Found reliance on default encoding in br.unb.cic.iris.command.console.ConsoleSendMessageCommand.createMessage(): new java.util.Scanner(InputStream)
Found reliance on default encoding in br.unb.cic.iris.command.console.LoadCommand.execute(): new java.util.Scanner(InputStream)
